definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: Nine Thai officers from the anti-narcotics unit have since been charged with murder.
sentences.chinese: 泰国缉毒部队的九名人员已被指控犯有谋杀罪。

sentences.english: Huey was awaiting trial for murder.
sentences.chinese: 休伊因谋杀罪正在等候审判。

sentences.english: When the jury pronounced him guilty of murder, john did not bat an eye.
sentences.chinese: 当陪审团宣判约翰犯有谋杀罪时，他面不改色。

sentences.english: He would eventually confess to the murders under the threat of torture.
sentences.chinese: 迫于严刑的威胁，他最后承认了所犯谋杀罪行。

sentences.english: You have seen how people from the military have gotten away with murder.
sentences.chinese: 你可以看到军队里的人是如何逃过谋杀罪名的。
他们指控他犯了谋杀罪。

sentences.english: Jack has been brought before the court on a charge of murder.
sentences.chinese: 杰克以谋杀罪被迫出庭受审。

sentences.english: He was found not guilty of murder on the grounds of diminished responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 他未被判谋杀罪是基于精神失常而减轻了刑事责任。

sentences.english: 1969-Britain's Parliament abolished the death penalty for murder.
sentences.chinese: 1969年的今天，英国议会终止对谋杀罪适用死刑。

sentences.english: So is faking the murder of a suspect’s loved ones.
sentences.chinese: 虐待谋杀罪嫌疑人是很讨喜的情节。

sentences.english: There is no denying the fact that he is guilty of murder.
sentences.chinese: 他犯有谋杀罪这个事实是不容否认的。

sentences.english: Castro was to be arraigned today, and is to face a capital murder charge.
sentences.chinese: 卡斯特罗是今天被提审，并面临死刑的谋杀罪指控。

sentences.english: Police have arrested her boyfriend, George Huguely, and charged him with first-degree murder.
sentences.chinese: 警察已经逮捕了她的男友，乔治，判为一级谋杀罪。

definition: see 過失致死罪|过失致死罪[guo4 shi1 zhi4 si3 zui4]
to imprison/to jail/to take into custody
